noun.description: Any of various fabled or mythological birds associated with fire.
United States regional. Either of two songbirds with bright orange or red in the plumage: the Baltimore oriole, Icterus galbula, and the scarlet tanager, Piranga olivacea.

origin: Late 16th century (in an earlier sense). In some forms from the genitive of fire + bird. In some forms from fire + bird.
